Title: Relates to medical exemptions from vaccination requirements
Summary: Provides that it shall not be considered professional misconduct for a physician to provide a certification that an immunization may be detrimental to a patient's health if, in his or her professional judgment, such immunization poses a risk to such patient.
LawCode: Add §6509-f, Ed L; amd §§2164 & 2805-h, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law and the public health law, in relation to medical exemptions from vaccination requirements
